subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After a three-game sweep by the Red Sox, the Yankees are three games out of a wild-card spot — four in the loss column — with two other teams between them and the leaders with 12 games remaining.
snippet: After a three-game sweep by the Red Sox, the Yankees are three games out of a wild-card spot — four in the loss column — with two other teams between them and the leaders with 12 games remaining.
